## Reasoning

To address the issue of renaming properties prefixed by `javax` with `jakarta`, we need to update the `persistence.xml` file. 

1.  We need to import the correct namespace for Jakarta Persistence API (JPA) 3.0, which is `https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/persistence/persistence_3_0.xsd`. This is because the namespace has changed from `https://java.sun.com/xml/ns/persistence/persistence_3_0.xsd` in JPA 2.2 to `https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/persistence/persistence_3_0.xsd` in JPA 3.0.

2.  We need to update the `xsi:schemaLocation` attribute to point to the correct schema location for JPA 3.0.

3.  We need to update the `javax.persistence.schema-generation.database.action` property to `jakarta.persistence.schema-generation.database.action`.

4.  We need to update the `hibernate` properties to use the correct prefix `jakarta.persistence` instead of `javax.persistence`.

## Updated File

```xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<persistence version="3.0"
             xmlns="https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/persistence" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
             xsi:schemaLocation="
        https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/persistence
        https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/persistence/persistence_3_0.xsd">
    <persistence-unit name="primary">
        <jta-data-source>java:jboss/datasources/CoolstoreDS</jta-data-source>
        <properties>
            <property name="jakarta.persistence.schema-generation.database.action" value="none"/>
            <property name="jakarta.persistence.hibernate.show_sql" value="false" />
            <property name="jakarta.persistence.hibernate.format_sql" value="true" />
            <property name="jakarta.persistence.hibernate.use_sql_comments" value="true" />
            <property name="jakarta.persistence.hibernate.jdbc.use_get_generated_keys" value="false" />
        </properties>
    </persistence-unit>
</persistence>
```

## Additional Information

The `persistence.xml` file should be placed in the `src/main/resources/META-INF` directory in the Quarkus project.

The `pom.xml` file should be updated to include the following dependencies:

```xml
<dependency>
    <groupId>jakarta.persistence</groupId>
    <artifactId>jakarta.persistence-api</artifactId>
    <version>3.0.0</version>
</dependency>
<dependency>
    <groupId>jakarta.persistence</groupId>
    <artifactId>jakarta.persistence-jpa</artifactId>
    <version>3.0.0</version>
</dependency>
```

The `pom.xml` file should also be updated to include the following plugin:

```xml
<plugin>
    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
    <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
    <version>3.10.0</version>
    <configuration>
        <source>11</source>
        <target>11</target>
    </configuration>
</plugin>
```

Note: The above plugin configuration is for Java 11. You may need to adjust it according to your Java version.
